Author: nikkybtc
Title: [ANN][ICO]EPOCH decentralized commercial blockchain platform
Body: EPOCH BLOCKCHAIN  Project name EPOCH Blockchain Token symbol ( ticker ) EPO  http://i66.tinypic.com/crofq.jpg  Core description representing the project   Based on our innovation, EPOCH development team has created “EPOCH Blockchain” solutions that provide enterprise-level services. Based on the concept of “open and sharing”, EPOCH will build a blockchain infrastructure and open its internal development capabilities to share with global enterprises to jointly promote the development of trusted Internet and create a win-win ecosystem of blockchain. The existing team members have rich experience and solid technical practice in various fields such as ERP project implementation, system architecture design and distributed application development (DAPP). The backbone of the team’s technical staff has made great achievements in big data analysis and processing, financial security system construction, and exploration of cloud ecology and industry connection.  Scheduled start/end date time ( UTC ) EPO Token sale is divided into two periods, lasting for 35 days in total. It includes Pre ICO (fromJanuary 1, 2018 to January 5, 2018)(almost finished)period and ICO period(From January 8, 2018 to February 7, 2018).  Token platform Own [Suspicious link removed]patiable with Ethereum    Token supply amount 90 million    Token fundraising target amount 28000 ETH    Country originated Switzerland    Website, whitepaper and social media links  Website: http://www.epoch-blockchain.io/ Whitepaper: http://www.epoch-blockchain.io/EPOCH_whitepaper.pdf  Twitter: https://twitter.com/Epoch_Fintech  Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mEVb1jcjiCw&t=126s  Medium: https://medium.com/@epoch.blockchain  Github: https://github.com/EPOCHBlockchain  Telegram:https://t.me/joinchat/HYuYkwv-r2ldMKMwAQ5WUA    Team member names, social media links All team members:http://www.epoch-blockchain.io/team.html  Team email:epoch.blockchain@gmail.com

Title: [ANN][ICO]EPOCH decentralized commercial blockchain platform
Body: Since you are starting the thread today after the closing of pre-ico even ICO has five days since it is live. Author: SeveralQ
Title: [ANN][ICO]EPOCH decentralized commercial blockchain platform
Body: Hi everyone! Just added Epock ICO to my website https://concourseq.io/Q/Epoch_blockchain. ConcourseQ is a collaborative due diligence community that researches and reviews ICOs. Anyone with an account can submit information to your page, so we are reaching out to this community to get you all involved in the discussion. Thanks! PS: If you have any questions about filling in the info, feel free to ask us in our discord group: https://discord.gg/j8RBAwB
